T08D4108:157b-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa shlo ka gcig bstan te /
T08D4108:157b-18: de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la gnas pas na 'jungs pa dang /
T08D4108:157b-19: ser sna'i dri shin tu spangs te phral bas na /
T08D4108:157b-20: bdag gi longs spyod la ma chags shing gtong ba skyong zhing sbyin par byed pa dang /
T08D4108:157b-21: gzhan gyi longs spyod la mi lta bas na ma byin par mi len to //
T08D4108:157b-22: ma byin par mi len pas na bsod nams rab tu 'phel lo zhe'o //
T08D4108:157b-23: tshigs su bcad pa rtsa ba 'dis ni 'dod pa'i
T08D4108:157b-24: khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i 'dod chags
T08D4108:157b-25: spong bar 'gyur ro / bsdams pas dgra sogs mi
T08D4108:157b-26: 'gyur ro // zhes bya ba 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mthong bas na bsdams pa zhes bya ste /
T08D4108:157b-27: bsdams pa ni lus dang ngag yid gsum gyi sgo
T08D4108:157b-28: nas nyes pa mi 'byung zhing shin tu sdom pa
T08D4108:157b-30: tshul khrims bsrungs pas na gzhan gyi srog mi gcod do //
T08D4108:157b-31: srog ma bcad pas na sems la byams pa dang ldan par 'gyur te /
T08D4108:157b-32: byams pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pas khong khro ba med do //
T08D4108:157b-33: tshigs su bcad pa rtsa ba 'dis ni 'dod pa'i
T08D4108:157b-34: khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i khong khro
T08D4108:157b-36: dge dang ldan pas sdig pa spong //
T08D4108:157b-37: zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sems rtse gcig par yongs su bsgoms pas na /
T08D4108:157b-38: sdig pa mi spyod de de bas na dge ba dang ldan pa nyid do zhe'o //
T08D4108:157b-39: tshigs su bcad pa rtsa ba 'dis ni 'dod pa'i
T08D4108:157b-40: khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nga rgyal
T08D4108:157b-41: dang ma rig pa spong bar ston to //
T08D4108:157b-42: sbyin pas bsod nams rab tu 'phel //
T08D4108:158a-0: zhes bya ba man chad tshigs su bcad pa rtsa ba @158a * //
T08D4108:158a-2: 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i 'dod chags dang /
T08D4108:158a-3: khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa bzhi gcig tu bsdus nas gsum du bsdoms te /
T08D4108:158a-4: chen po dang 'bring po dang chung ngu gsum la gcig gsum gsum ste /
T08D4108:158a-5: nyon mongs pa'i rim pa rnam pa dgu la drug
T08D4108:158a-6: man chad spangs pa ni phyir 'ong ba'i gang zag
T08D4108:158a-7: ces bya'o // dgu char spangs pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i gang zag ces bya'o //
T08D4108:158a-8: nyon mongs zad pa mya ngan 'da' //
T08D4108:158a-9: zhes bya ba tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ni /
T08D4108:158a-10: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang
T08D4108:158a-11: bar bya 'dod chags dang nga rgyal dang ma rig
T08D4108:158a-12: pa dang gsum khams gnyis na gsum gsum ste /
T08D4108:158a-13: drug la yang thum po gcig tu byas la /
T08D4108:158a-17: gcig la yang gsum gsum du bya ste /
T08D4108:158a-18: nyon mongs pa'i rim pa dgu ste /
T08D4108:158a-19: dgu char spangs pa ni dgra bcom pa'o //
T08D4108:158a-20: de bas na gang zag brgyad la bzhi ni dngos
T08D4108:158a-21: su bshad pas bzhi ni nyon mongs pa'i rim pa
T08D4108:158a-23: rgyun du 'jug pa spangs zin pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa ste /
T08D4108:158a-25: de bas na gang zag brgyad kyi rim pa ni 'dir bstan zin to //
T08D4108:158a-26: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i sku ring la 'du la ba la bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas te /
T08D4108:158a-27: 'dul ba 'bum dag ma bstan pa'i tshe dge slong
T08D4108:158a-28: nyes pa la mig che zhing mi dge ba'i chos
T08D4108:158a-29: la nye bar gnas pa dang /
T08D4108:158a-30: dge ba cung zad spyad pa tsam gyis kyang thar par 'gyur ro zhes bsnyems pa'i phyir /
T08D4108:158a-31: 'di lta bu'i lta ba bzlog cing de'i gnyen por de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub bas /
T08D4108:158a-32: sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste //
T08D4108:158a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang bzhis bstan to //
T08D4108:158a-35: sdig pa thams cad mi bya'o //
T08D4108:158a-36: zhes bya ba shlo ka gcig gis nyes pa la mig che ba'i gnyen por bstan to //
T08D4108:158a-37: dge ba cung zad tsam gyis kyang mgu zhing sdig
T08D4108:158a-38: pa mi bya ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs
T08D4108:158a-39: te / mi dge ba bcu dang /
T08D4108:158a-41: yang na 'jig rten na yul chos kyis mi mdzes shing /
T08D4108:158a-42: bya ba mi rigs pa thams cad mi bya'o //
T08D4108:158a-43: mkhas par bsnyen par rdzogs zhes bya ba ni bcom
T08D4108:158a-44: ldan 'das kyi lung gis gnang zhing rab tu 'byung
T08D4108:158a-46: bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang ba de lta bus bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o zhe'o //
T08D4108:158a-47: yang na mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang ldan pa la bya /
T08D4108:158b-0: bsnyen pa ni dge @158b ba rdzogs par bya ba'i
T08D4108:158b-1: don yin pas ngag gis mi bya ba bzhi ste
T08D4108:158b-4: zhe gcod par mi smra zhing lhag pa'i shes rab kyi phung po dang /
T08D4108:158b-5: lhag pa'i shes rab la rab tu 'jug pa'o zhe'o //
T08D4108:158b-6: rang gi sems kyang yongs su gdul //
T08D4108:158b-8: yid kyis mi bya ba gsum ste /
T08D4108:158b-9: chags par mi bsams pa dang /
T08D4108:158b-10: ngan du mi bsams pa dang /
T08D4108:158b-12: gzhan du na ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /
T08D4108:158b-13: lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
T08D4108:158b-14: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa zhes bya ba ni
T08D4108:158b-15: yid ches par bya ba'i phyir sh'akya thub pas bstan
T08D4108:158b-16: pa'o zhe'o // des ni nyes pa la mig che ba bzlog pa'i gnyen por bshad do //
T08D4108:158b-17: nyes pa ni spang ba'i thabs bshad de /
T08D4108:158b-18: lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste //
T08D4108:158b-19: zhes bya ba shlo ka phyed dang gnyis smos te /
T08D4108:158b-20: lus dang ngag yid gsum sdom pa ni gong ma dag dang yang sbyar /
T08D4108:158b-21: yang na lus kyi nyes pa dang /
T08D4108:158b-23: yid kyi nyes pa 'di bsdams na sdig pa mi 'phel bas na /
T08D4108:158b-24: de'i phyir bsdam par bya'o zhes smos so //
T08D4108:158b-25: de bas na lus kyi sdom pa gang legs na /
T08D4108:158b-27: ngag gis sdom pa yang legs pa yin no /
T08D4108:158b-28: yid kyi sdom pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T08D4108:158b-29: de'i phyir thams cad bsdom par bya'o zhe'o //
T08D4108:158b-30: thams cad sdom pa legs pa ni dus gsum du lus dang ngag yid gsum sngom pa'o //
T08D4108:158b-31: kun du bsdoms pa'i dge slong ni yul dang /
T08D4108:158b-32: dus dang gang zag la chad pa med par tshul khrims bsrung ba'o //
T08D4108:158b-33: sdug bsngal gsum las rab tu grol //
T08D4108:158b-34: zhes bya ba sdug bsngal ni gsum dang /
T08D4108:158b-36: khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa dgu bcu rtsa brgyad
T08D4108:158b-37: las rnam par grol zhing 'khor ba'i btson ra nas
T08D4108:158b-39: des ni nyon mongs pa spong ba'i thabs su bshad do //
T08D4108:158b-40: ngag rnams bsrung zhing yid kyis rab bsdams zhes bya
T08D4108:158b-41: ba shlo ka gcig gis dran pa mi brjed pa'i
T08D4108:158b-43: ngag gi srung ba ni ngag gis mi bya ba bzhi dang /
T08D4108:158b-44: gzhan du na rang gi ltung ba lci yang ci
T08D4108:158b-45: byung na dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis glengs shing bstan
T08D4108:158b-46: na / slar 'khyal zhing mi smra bar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi khar gus par nyan pa'o //
T08D4108:158b-47: yid kyis bsdams pa ni 'gyod tshangs byed pa'i tshe /
T08D4108:158b-48: tshig gis smras pa ma zad kyis /
T08D4108:158b-49: yid kyis sems thag pa nas mthol ba'o //
T08D4108:159a-0: yang na yid kyis mi bya ba de gsum phyin chad mi byed par yid @159a * //
T08D4108:159a-2: lus kyis mi dge ba mi byed //
T08D4108:159a-4: lus kyis mi bya ba ni gsum ste /
T08D4108:159a-6: ma byin par mi len pa dang /
T08D4108:159a-7: 'dod pas log par mi spyod pa'o //
T08D4108:159a-8: yang na lus snyogs pa dang /
T08D4108:159a-10: 'tshog pa la sogs pa'i las rnams mi byed pa'o //
T08D4108:159a-11: rnam pa gzhan du na lus kyi spyod yul ma yin pa lnga spang bar ston te /
T08D4108:159a-12: de yang gang yin zhe na /
T08D4108:159a-15: chang 'tshong ba dang rol mo mkhan gyi khyim dang /
T08D4108:159a-16: smad 'tshong gi khyim rnams su mi spyod pa'o //
T08D4108:159a-17: las lam gsum po 'di dag rab sbyangs nas //
T08D4108:159a-18: drang srong gsungs pa'i lam ni thob par 'gyur //
T08D4108:159a-19: zhes bya ba lam zhes bya ba ni dpe ste /
T08D4108:159a-20: 'di ltar lam la skye bo kun rgyu zhing 'gro
T08D4108:159a-21: ba ltar lus dang ngag yid gsum gyi lam la
T08D4108:159a-22: yang / dge sdig gi dngos po rgyu zhing 'gro bar byed pas lam dang 'dra ste /
T08D4108:159a-23: de gsum rab tu sbyangs pas na dri ma dang /
T08D4108:159a-24: skyon med par sbyangs pas drang po'i lam zhes bya ste /
T08D4108:159a-25: des thob pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin pas na /
T08D4108:159a-26: 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad la lung dang mthun par spyad pas na /
T08D4108:159a-27: gang zag brgyad kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro zhe'o //
T08D4108:159a-28: de bas na sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i tshe'i nyan thos ni /
T08D4108:159a-29: lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du shlo ka 'di rnams
T08D4108:159a-30: kyis 'dul zhing rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhing spyod
T08D4108:159a-31: do // lo bcu gsum du gyur nas ni 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gnas bcas so //
T08D4108:159a-32: de la sangs rgyas rabs bdun po smos pa ni bsdu ba'i tshig ste /
T08D4108:159a-33: gong du smras pa'i tshig 'og tu 'di'o zhes bsdus nas yang dag par bstan pa'o //
T08D4108:159a-35: zhes bya ba ni khyim pa'i phyogs nas bstod pa ste /
T08D4108:159a-36: thub pa ni sgo gsum nas nyes pa mi 'byung bar thub pa'o //
T08D4108:159a-37: goo tam zhes bya ba ni yon tan gyi rnam grangs kyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
T08D4108:159a-38: lha'i lha zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi lha
T08D4108:159a-39: dang rnam par grol ba'i lha gnyis yod pa las
T08D4108:159a-40: / sh'akya thub pa rigs kyi 'jig rten gyi lha chen po brjed pa'i tshe /
T08D4108:159a-41: rgyal bud don grub pa btsas nas rgyal bu don grub kyis lha de la phyag byas pa dang /
T08D4108:159a-42: lha de mgo tshal pa bdun du gas pas /
T08D4108:159a-43: de bas kyang 'phags par gyur pas na lha'i lha zhes sh'akya thub pa la mtshan du gsol /
T08D4108:159a-44: mi 'dul ba ni sh'akya thub pa 'jig rten du gshegs pa'i tshe dus ngan te /
T08D4108:159a-45: skye bo rnams shin tu gdul dka' ba'i phyir de lta bu gdul bas na mi gdul gdul ba'o //
T08D4108:159b-0: @159b yang na mi gdul ba ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa mdzes dga' dang /
T08D4108:159b-1: zhe sdang dang ldan pa sor mo'i phreng ba dang /
T08D4108:159b-2: gti mug dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung lta bu shin tu gdul dka' ba yang /
T08D4108:159b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis btul nas dge ba la gzhag pas na mi 'dul ba'o //
T08D4108:159b-4: yang rnyog pa lnga ni sems can dang lta ba dang /
T08D4108:159b-8: rnyog pa lnga'i tshe mi 'dul bas na mi 'dul ba'o zhe'o //
T08D4108:159b-9: kha lo sgyur ba ni khams gsum gyi sems can
T08D4108:159b-10: nyon mongs pa las 'phags pa'i lam du kha lo
T08D4108:159b-12: bla na med pa ni nyan thos man chad tshangs pa dang /
T08D4108:159b-13: brgya byin gyis gdul ba rgya chung ngu lta bu ma yin te /
T08D4108:159b-14: rgya che zhing gong na med pas bla na med pa'o //
T08D4108:159b-15: 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa'i mchog / ces bya
T08D4108:159b-16: ba 'jig rten ni nye bar len pa'i phung po
T08D4108:159b-17: lnga la bya'o // mgon po ni sems can thams
T08D4108:159b-18: cad kyi mgon du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa
T08D4108:159b-19: lnga la bya'o // la bya'o // de skyob ba
T08D4108:159b-20: ni skye bo ngan par spyad cing ngan song du
T08D4108:159b-21: 'gro ba las skyob cing thar par 'dren pas skyob
T08D4108:159b-22: lnga la bya'o // la bya'o // pa zhes bya'o
T08D4108:159b-23: // mchog ni skyob par byed pa mang mod kyi
T08D4108:159b-24: sangs rgyas kyi skyob pa lta bu gzhan la med
T08D4108:159b-25: lnga la bya'o // la bya'o // pa zhes bya'o
T08D4108:159b-26: // pas na / sangs rgyas kyi skyob pa ni
T08D4108:159b-28: sangs rgyas bdun po zhes smos pa dang /
T08D4108:159b-29: skabs 'dir kha cig the tshom du gyur te /
T08D4108:159b-30: sangs rgyas bdun por zas kyis phyis 'byung ngam mi 'byung snyam pa la /
T08D4108:159b-31: phyis sangs rgyas 'byung bar bstan pa'i gleng gzhi ni
T08D4108:159b-32: mdo sde bzang po zhes bya ba'i nang nas 'byung
T08D4108:159b-33: ba bskal pa gsum yod de /
T08D4108:159b-36: de la chu'i bskal pa bdo zhing 'gyur ba'i tshe /
T08D4108:159b-37: 'od gsal lha'i ris su 'di lta bu'i ltas byung ste /
T08D4108:159b-38: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung ba de snyed kyi pad mo rdzing las skyes te /
T08D4108:159b-39: de'i tshe rdzing chen po las pad ma stod rtsa bdun byung nas /
T08D4108:159b-40: lha dag na re ae ma'o //
T08D4108:159b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa stong rtsa bdun 'byung ba'i ltas shig ces zer te /
T08D4108:159b-42: de dag las sangs rgyas rabs bdun 'das zin te /
T08D4108:159b-43: rnam par gzigs nas sh'akya thub pa bzhugs pa'i bar du'o //
T08D4108:159b-44: stod rtsa bdun las bdun gshegs zin pas ltag pa stong gdod gshegs par 'gyur te /
T08D4108:159b-45: tha mar ni phyag na rdo rje bzhed pa can zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur zhing /
T08D4108:159b-46: sems can gyi don mdzad do zhes 'byung ngo //
T08D4108:159b-47: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don bya ba la mi skyo mi ldog pa dang /
T08D4108:160a-0: nyon mongs pa dang bdud kyi dgra rnams 'joms par byed pas @160a * //
T08D4108:160a-2: yang na bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du sems can gyi don mdzad pas na dpa' bo zhe'o //
T08D4108:160a-3: bdun po ni rnam par gzigs nas sh'akya thub pa'i bar du sngar byung ba rnams kyi grangs so //
T08D4108:160a-4: grags ldan ni sangs rgyas bdun po'i yon tan te /
T08D4108:160a-5: bdud bzhi bcom nas bsod nams dang /
T08D4108:160a-6: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan no zhes 'jig rten du grags pa'o //
T08D4108:160a-7: so sor thar pa ni sangs rgyas bdun pos bshad pa'i so sor thar ba /
T08D4108:160a-8: bzod ba dka' thub dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T08D4108:160a-9: de ni rab tu rgyas par bshad //
T08D4108:160a-10: ces bya ba ni de ltar tshig nyung ngu zin
T08D4108:160a-11: gyis kyang don kun 'dir 'dus pas na de dag
T08D4108:160a-12: gi tshe de tsam dag gis kyang nyan thos de
T08D4108:160a-13: dag rnam par grol zhing bslab pa las mi 'da'
T08D4108:160a-14: bar rgyas pa dang 'dra bar 'bras bu thob pas
T08D4108:160a-15: na rgyas pa zhes bshad do //
T08D4108:160a-16: 'di la sangs rgyas rnams dang gang //
T08D4108:160a-17: zhes bya ba shlo ka gcig gis sangs rgyas bdun gyi yon tan dang /
T08D4108:160a-19: 'di la zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bdun gyis gsungs pa'i so sor thar pa 'di la'o //
T08D4108:160a-20: sangs rgyas nyan thos dag kyang gus //
T08D4108:160a-21: zhes bya ba snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bdun
T08D4108:160a-22: po dag kyang so sor thar pa la bsrung zhing
T08D4108:160a-24: bla mar byas shing yongs su bsrung bas na bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob po //
T08D4108:160a-25: de bzhin du nyan thos rnams kyang gus par byed do //
T08D4108:160a-26: de la gus bcas gyur pa dang //
T08D4108:160a-27: zhes gus pa dang bcas pa ni tshul khrims sdom zhing nan tan du bsrung ba'o //
T08D4108:160a-29: zhes pa 'dus ma byas pa ni brag pa med pa'i chos te /
T08D4108:160a-31: de yang ji ltar thob ce na so sor thar
T08D4108:160a-32: pa bsrung zhing yongs su bsdams pas sdug bsngal dang
T08D4108:160a-34: 'gog pa dang lam ni mngon sum du byas shing
T08D4108:160a-35: yongs su bsgoms pas 'du byed thams cad yongs su
T08D4108:160a-37: brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya //
T08D4108:160a-38: zhes bya ba shlo ka gcig ni slob dpon au
T08D4108:160a-39: p'a lis rab tu byung ba dang khyem ba'i phyogs
T08D4108:160a-40: dge ba'i phyogs la gzhen bskul gdab pa dang /
T08D4108:160a-41: dad pa skyed cing spro bar bya ba'i phyir thabs bstan pa ston te /
T08D4108:160a-42: brtsam par bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad cing mos nas /
T08D4108:160a-43: de la 'jug cing bslab par brtsams pa'o //
T08D4108:160a-44: 'byung ba ni brtan pa la bslabs nas don go ba dang khyim spong zhing rab byung ba'o //
T08D4108:160a-45: sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya //
T08D4108:160a-46: zhes pa sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bden pa
T08D4108:160b-0: bzhi dang @160b so sor thar pa nyid la bya'o
T08D4108:160b-1: // khyim nas byung phan chad sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bden pa bzhi dang /
T08D4108:160b-3: so sor thar pa yang dag par 'jug pa zhe'o //
T08D4108:160b-4: de ni mthong ba'i lam gyis bskyed do //
T08D4108:160b-5: 'dom bu'i khyim na glang chen bzhin //
T08D4108:160b-6: 'chi bdag sde rnams gzhom par bya //
T08D4108:160b-7: zhes bya ba bsgom pa'i lam gyis bskyed pa ste /
T08D4108:160b-8: gong du bden pa bzhi dang 'phags pa'i lam brgyad
T08D4108:160b-9: yongs su bsgoms pas 'chi bdag gi ste skye rgan
T08D4108:160b-10: 'chi rnams so sor thar pas bsdams pa dang /
T08D4108:160b-11: bden pa bzhi bsgoms pa'i mthus gzhom par byed pa'o //
T08D4108:160b-13: 'dom bu'i khyim snying po med cing mi brten pa
T08D4108:160b-14: la glang pos bcom pa bzhin du skye rga na
T08D4108:160b-15: 'chi'i sde rtsva khyim dang 'dra ba la bsod nams
T08D4108:160b-16: dang ye shes kyi glang po dang 'dra bas 'joms
T08D4108:160b-17: par byed pa'o // gang zhig rab tu bag yod pa //
T08D4108:160b-18: zhes pa shlo ka gnyis kyis ni bslab pa la nan tan byed pa'i brjod pa ston te /
T08D4108:160b-19: gang zhig ces bya ba ni skye bo dge ba can la bya /
T08D4108:160b-20: bag yod pa ni dge ba can te /
T08D4108:160b-21: nyon mongs pa la bag byed pa'o //
T08D4108:160b-23: zhes pa chos 'dul ba ni so sor thar pa
T08D4108:160b-24: dang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bya'o spyod par
T08D4108:160b-25: 'gyur ba ni skye bo dge can 'di la spyod
T08D4108:160b-26: par 'jug pa'o // skye ba'i 'khor bar ba spangs
T08D4108:160b-27: zhes pa zhes pa skye ba rnam pa bzhi la
T08D4108:160b-28: par 'jug pa'o // bya'o // 'khor ba ni lam rgyud lnga la bya ste /
T08D4108:160b-29: gang du so sor thar pa dang bden pa la
T08D4108:160b-30: bsgoms pas rnam pa de dgu spangs par 'gyur ro
T08D4108:160b-31: zhe'o // sdug bsngal tha mar phyin par 'gyur //
T08D4108:160b-32: zhes pa gong du skye ba dang /
T08D4108:160b-33: 'khor ba yongs su spangs pas na /
T08D4108:160b-34: sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad las thar bar 'gyur te /
T08D4108:160b-35: mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam gyi mthar phyin pa de 'gyur ro zhe'o //
T08D4108:160b-36: phan tshun khrims srung ba zhes bya ba tshul khrims
T08D4108:160b-37: srung ba ni sgo gsum nas nyes pa mi 'byung
T08D4108:160b-39: nyes pa byung na yang gcig la gcig bshags shing mthol dang nyes pa gsol ba'o //
T08D4108:160b-40: bstan pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni nyes pa mthol zhing gsol bas na /
T08D4108:160b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab mi 'grib cing rgyas pa dang 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhe'o //
T08D4108:160b-42: so sor thar pa bshad pas ni //
T08D4108:160b-43: dge 'dun gyis ni gso sbyong byas //
T08D4108:160b-44: zhes bya ba ni gong du smos pa phan tshun tshul khrims mig bzhin du bsrung ba dang /
T08D4108:160b-45: bstan pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir so sor thar pa bshad cing gso sbyong bya'o zhe'o //
T08D4108:161a-1: gi phyir ni mdo bshad ces bya ba shlo ka gcig gis yang dag par bsrung ba ston te /
T08D4108:161a-2: srog mi phangs par tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o zhe'o //
T08D4108:161a-3: gang gi phyir ni mdo bshad ces bya ba ni
T08D4108:161a-4: ci'i phyir so sor thar pa'i mdo bshad ces bya
T08D4108:161a-5: ba'i don to // gang phyir gso spyod byas gyur
T08D4108:161a-6: zhes pa tshul khrims dam du srung zhing bsrung bar
T08D4108:161a-7: ba'i don to // bya ba'o // tshul khrims de
T08D4108:161a-8: ni bsrung byas zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong byas
T08D4108:161a-9: pas chog pa ma yin gyi tshul khrims bsrung ba
T08D4108:161a-10: la nan tan spyod du gzhug pa'o //
T08D4108:161a-11: g-yag rnga'i rtse mo ji bzhin no //
T08D4108:161a-12: zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims mig bzhin du phangs
T08D4108:161a-13: shing srog gi phyir yang mi dral ba'i dpe ste
T08D4108:161a-14: / gzhan kha cig na re nags stug po'i nang
T08D4108:161a-15: na gnas pa'i tshe rnga ma shing la mi thogs
T08D4108:161a-16: shing mi zin pa dang mi zegs mi gong cing
T08D4108:161a-17: / / shing la thogs shing zin na yang god
T08D4108:161a-18: cing zegs su dogs nas bag byed pa ltar bslab
T08D4108:161a-19: pa la zhugs pa'i gang zag kyang tshul khrims srog
T08D4108:161a-20: gi phyir yang mi dral lo zhes bstan to //
T08D4108:161a-21: so sor thar pa bshad pa 'di nas 'phags pa
T08D4108:161a-22: la au p'a lis dang po rtsom pa'i tshe bgegs
T08D4108:161a-23: dang bar chad kyis mi tshugs par bya ba dang
T08D4108:161a-24: / brtsams pa rnams mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir
T08D4108:161a-25: rang gi lha yid du 'ong ba la brten nas
T08D4108:161a-26: / / brtsams pa rnams kyi mthar yang phyin /
T08D4108:161a-27: bgegs dang bar chad zhi nas skye bo so so'i smon lam btab ba'o //
T08D4108:161a-28: so sor thar pa bshad pa ni so sor thar pa bshad pa'o //
T08D4108:161a-29: bsod nams grub pa gang yod pa bsod nams grub
T08D4108:161a-30: pa ni de'i bsod nams bdag gis cung zad ci
T08D4108:161a-32: des ni 'jig rten ma lus par de'i bsod nams ma lus pa de nyid kyis so //
T08D4108:161a-33: 'jig rten ni nye bar len pa'i phung po ma lus pa ni khams gsum mo /
T08D4108:161a-34: thub dbang go 'phang thob par shog / ces bya ba ni /
T08D4108:161a-35: thub dbang ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
T08D4108:161a-36: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi dbang po'o //
T08D4108:161a-37: go 'phang ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang thabs so //
T08D4108:161a-38: thob par shog ces bya ba ni khams gsum gyi
T08D4108:161a-39: sems can thams cad kyang 'di ltar gyur cig ces
T08D4108:161a-40: bya ba'o // so sor thar pa'i mdo rdzogs pa ni brtsams pa mthar phyin te /
T08D4108:161a-41: nyan pa rnams dbugs phyin pa'i phyir zhes smos so //
T08D4108:161a-42: so sor thar pa'i bshad pa mi brjed dran byed tsam du bris pa rdzogs so //
T08D4108:161a-43: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz'a ran dha ra dang
T08D4108:161a-44: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen
T08D4108:161a-45: bzang pos bsgyur ci la zhus te gtan la phab
